task.summary: Secure user sessions & cookies with basic sign-up and login forms.
Added error notifications to login page
Fixed notification throwing with 'Flash'; config/puma.rb no longer commits changes to git as repository version != local version; both incompatible.
Actually fixed notification throwing with 'Flash' and removed erronous @user calls on login page.
